fields.name: Rent:
fields.value: $20X where X is the number of Capsule Properties held by the Owner.

fields.name: Stop-in Effects:
fields.value:
Depends on the number of Capsule Properties held by the owner.
1. You are sent directly to your Starting Space without collecting $200 or activating its effect.
2. You are sent directly to your Starting Space without activating its effect. You lose $200 instead of collecting it.
3. You are sent directly to your Starting Space, and you activate its effect. However, the $200 goes to the Owner instead of yourself, and any other beneficial effects of the Space will apply to the Owner instead.
